v1.name: action_based
v1.description: Uses last action from action_descriptions metadata

v2.name: document_full
v2.description: Uses full episode LLM description from document text

v3.name: document_chunk
v3.description: Uses chunk LLM description from document text

v4.name: fused_multimodal
v4.description: Uses fused video+text embeddings for similarity search with next_action retrieval
